items.badge_description: While a pint of traditional English ale will always remain a staple, the craft beer scene in England, much like the rest of the world, has continued to grow at a rapid rate! That's 245 different beers from a brewery from England! Try 5 more for Level 50!

items.badge_description: Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 365 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower.
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 95 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 20! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

While a pint of traditional English ale will always remain a staple, the craft beer scene in England, much like the rest of the world, has continued to grow at a rapid rate! That's 90 different beers from a brewery from England! Try 5 more for Level 19!

items.checkin_comment: Drank November 2014. Grapefruit and pine aroma. Caramel malt flavours with a splash of bitter fruit. Light bitter finish. Competent session ale.

user.bio: Craft and cask beer loving postman and landlord of the noted and highly regarded Lord Alwold Home Bar/Man cave.
